mapper.select: SELECT p.id AS id, p.parent_id AS parentId, p.`code` AS `code`, p.`name` AS `name`, p.intro AS intro, p.category AS category, p.uri AS uri, p.created AS created, p.creator AS creator, p.edited AS edited, p.editor AS editor, p.deleted AS deleted FROM `tool_role` AS r, `tool_permission` AS p, `tool_role_permission` AS rp WHERE r.`id` = rp.`role_id` AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.`id` = rp.`permission_id` AND r.`id` = #{roleId};
